osrsAPI 0.1.0

    OSRS API

    OSRS API

    osrs_api_vignette.Rmd
    library(osrsAPI)

    The osrs_api function fetches information on the price of some item from the Weird Gloop API. An item name can be specified with space and improper capitalisation, and an argument can be given to specify how much data is requested. A simple call could look like this to get all historical price data on the Abyssal whip.

    whip <- osrs_api("Abyssal whip", history = "all")

    Possible history values

    Possible values of history are latest, last90d, all or sample. It’s only possible to query several items for the latest option. Fx. the following will return an error:

    bucket_and_whip <- osrs_api(c("bucket", "Abyssal whip"), history = "all")
#> Error in `osrs_api()`:
#> ! Multiple items only supported for `history = "latest"`

    But the following will work:

    bucket_and_whip <- osrs_api(c("bucket", "Abyssal whip"), history = "latest")

    Extracting information into a useful object

    Use the create_item_data function to extract the item information and put into a data set. Fx.

    create_item_data(whip)
#> # A tibble: 3,243 × 6
#>    item         id      price rel_day date       volume
#>    <chr>        <chr>   <int>   <dbl> <date>      <int>
#>  1 Abyssal whip 4151  1899375       0 2024-04-20   6332
#>  2 Abyssal whip 4151  1901588       1 2024-04-19   3676
#>  3 Abyssal whip 4151  1924803       2 2024-04-18   5471
#>  4 Abyssal whip 4151  1959491       3 2024-04-17   6509
#>  5 Abyssal whip 4151  1976147       4 2024-04-16  13050
#>  6 Abyssal whip 4151  1999665       5 2024-04-15   8021
#>  7 Abyssal whip 4151  2029879       6 2024-04-14   9517
#>  8 Abyssal whip 4151  2018762       7 2024-04-13   3019
#>  9 Abyssal whip 4151  1980217       8 2024-04-12   8129
#> 10 Abyssal whip 4151  1950761       9 2024-04-11   6326
#> # ℹ 3,233 more rows

    and

    create_item_data(bucket_and_whip)
#> # A tibble: 2 × 6
#>   item         id      price rel_day date        volume
#>   <chr>        <chr>   <int>   <dbl> <date>       <int>
#> 1 Abyssal whip 4151  1899375       0 2024-04-20    6332
#> 2 Bucket       1925        6       0 2024-04-20 3524268
